Course Description: THIS COURSE EXAMINES THE RELATIONSHIP OF MANAGERIAL ACCOUNTING TO THE CONTROL AND DECISION-MAKING FUNCTIONS OF MANAGEMENT. THE COURSE INCLUDES A STUDY OF THE WAYS THAT COSTS ARE CLASSIFIED AND ANALYZED IN TERMS OF MATERIALS AND LABOR, AS WELL AS OVERHEAD FOR JOB ORDER, PROCESS, AND ACTIVITY-BASED COST SYSTEMS.
Transfer Status: GUARANTEED TRANSFER TO INSTITUTION OFFERING SAME COURSE.
